title: UltimaKit For WP
description: UltimaKit for WP is a versatile WordPress plugin offering tools for SEO, GDPR compliance, custom post types, admin enhancements, and WooCommerce features. Free tools include cookie consent banners, post/page reordering, and admin notice management. Pro features add advanced SEO editing, admin activity logging, and custom post types. Additional modules cover customization, user management, and WooCommerce optimizations like auto-apply coupons and product timers.
